member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.IPerformanceStatistics.MonitoredProcessNames
member.summary: List of process names to monitor.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.IPerformanceStatistics.MonitoredProcesses
member.summary: Performance data for monitored processes. Key: process name, Value: list of process counters for all instances with that name. Refreshes process data on each access; previous process handles are disposed.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.IPerformanceStatistics.GetActiveTcpConnections(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Retrieve active TCP connections filtered by source and/or destination port.
member.returns: Array of TCP connections matching the filter criteria.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.IProcessCounters.ProcessTitle
member.summary: Main window title. Typically empty on non-Windows platforms as there is no window concept.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.IProcessCounters.CpuUtilizationPercent
member.summary: CPU utilization percentage for this process. Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform. Note: May return 0 on first call as CPU calculation requires two samples.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.IProcessCounters.HandleCount
member.summary: Number of handles. On Windows, returns the actual handle count. On Linux, returns the file descriptor count from /proc/[pid]/fd. On macOS, returns 0 as this metric is not readily available.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.IProcessCounters.NonPagedSystemMemory
member.summary: Non-paged system memory in bytes. Returns null on non-Windows platforms (Windows-specific concept).

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.IProcessCounters.PagedSystemMemory
member.summary: Paged system memory in bytes. Returns null on non-Windows platforms (Windows-specific concept).

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.IProcessCounters.PeakPagedSystemMemory
member.summary: Peak paged memory in bytes. Returns null on non-Windows platforms (Windows-specific tracking).

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.IProcessCounters.PeakWorkingSetMemory
member.summary: Peak working set memory in bytes.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.CpuUtilizationPercent
member.summary: CPU utilization percentage (0-100). Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform. Note: May return 0 on first call as CPU calculation requires two samples.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.MemoryFreeMegabytes
member.summary: Available/free memory in megabytes. Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.TotalDiskReadOperations
member.summary: Total disk read operations per second across all disks. Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.TotalDiskWriteOperations
member.summary: Total disk write operations per second across all disks. Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.TotalDiskReadQueue
member.summary: Average disk read queue length. Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform (e.g., macOS). Linux provides an approximation from /proc/diskstats.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.TotalDiskWriteQueue
member.summary: Average disk write queue length. Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform (e.g., macOS). Linux provides an approximation from /proc/diskstats.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.TotalDiskFreePercent
member.summary: Percentage of free disk space across all disks (0-100). Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.TotalDiskFreeMegabytes
member.summary: Free disk space in megabytes across all disks. Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.TotalDiskSizeMegabytes
member.summary: Total disk size in megabytes across all disks. Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.ISystemCounters.TotalDiskUsedMegabytes
member.summary: Used disk space in megabytes across all disks. Returns null if the metric is unavailable on this platform.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxPerformanceStatistics.MonitoredProcesses
member.summary: Statistics for monitored processes. Refreshes process data on each access; previous process handles are disposed.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxPerformanceStatistics.GetActiveTcpConnections(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Retrieve active TCP connections by port (source, destination, or both).

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxProcessCounters.ProcessTitle
member.summary: Process title. Typically empty on Linux (no window concept).

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxProcessCounters.CpuUtilizationPercent
member.summary: CPU utilization calculated from /proc/[pid]/stat. Requires two samples; first call returns 0.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxProcessCounters.HandleCount
member.summary: Handle count via /proc/[pid]/fd directory count. Returns 0 if permission denied or process exited.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxProcessCounters.NonPagedSystemMemory
member.summary: Non-paged system memory. Not applicable on Linux; returns null.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxProcessCounters.PagedSystemMemory
member.summary: Paged system memory. Not applicable on Linux; returns null.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxProcessCounters.PeakPagedSystemMemory
member.summary: Peak paged memory. Not tracked on Linux; returns null.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxProcessCounters.PeakWorkingSetMemory
member.summary: Peak working set memory in bytes.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxSystemCounters.CpuUtilizationPercent
member.summary: CPU utilization percentage. Requires two samples to calculate; first call initializes sampling and returns 0.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxSystemCounters.TotalDiskReadOperations
member.summary: Disk read operations per second. Requires two samples to calculate delta.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxSystemCounters.TotalDiskWriteOperations
member.summary: Disk write operations per second. Requires two samples to calculate delta.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxSystemCounters.TotalDiskReadQueue
member.summary: Disk read queue length. Approximated from I/O in progress from /proc/diskstats (divided by 2).

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.LinuxSystemCounters.TotalDiskWriteQueue
member.summary: Disk write queue length. Approximated from I/O in progress from /proc/diskstats (divided by 2).

member.name: T:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.ProcFileParser
member.summary: Utility class for parsing Linux /proc filesystem.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.ProcFileParser.GetCpuTimes
member.summary: Reads and parses /proc/stat to get CPU statistics. Returns (total jiffies, idle jiffies) tuple.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.ProcFileParser.CalculateCpuPercent(System.ValueTuple{System.Int64,System.Int64},System.ValueTuple{System.Int64,System.Int64})
member.summary: Calculates CPU utilization percentage from two samples.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.ProcFileParser.GetAvailableMemoryKb
member.summary: Reads /proc/meminfo and returns available memory in KB. Uses MemAvailable if present (kernel 3.14+), otherwise MemFree + Buffers + Cached.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.ProcFileParser.GetDiskStats
member.summary: Parses /proc/diskstats and returns aggregated I/O stats.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.ProcFileParser.GetProcessCpuTimes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads /proc/[pid]/stat for process CPU times. Returns (utime, stime) in clock ticks.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.ProcFileParser.GetProcessFdCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Counts file descriptors for a process via /proc/[pid]/fd.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Linux.ProcFileParser.GetClockTicksPerSecond
member.summary: Gets clock ticks per second (USER_HZ, typically 100 on Linux).

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacPerformanceStatistics.MonitoredProcesses
member.summary: Statistics for monitored processes. Refreshes process data on each access; previous process handles are disposed.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacPerformanceStatistics.GetActiveTcpConnections(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Retrieve active TCP connections by port (source, destination, or both).

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacProcessCounters.ProcessTitle
member.summary: Process title. Typically empty on macOS.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacProcessCounters.CpuUtilizationPercent
member.summary: CPU utilization using Process.TotalProcessorTime delta. Requires two samples; first call returns 0.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacProcessCounters.HandleCount
member.summary: Handle count. Returns 0 on macOS (not available via Process class).

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacProcessCounters.NonPagedSystemMemory
member.summary: Non-paged system memory. Not applicable on macOS; returns null.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacProcessCounters.PagedSystemMemory
member.summary: Paged system memory. Not applicable on macOS; returns null.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacProcessCounters.PeakPagedSystemMemory
member.summary: Peak paged memory. Not tracked on macOS; returns null.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacProcessCounters.PeakWorkingSetMemory
member.summary: Peak working set memory in bytes.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemCounters.TotalDiskReadOperations
member.summary: Disk read operations per second. Note: macOS iostat provides combined transfers; this returns half as approximation.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemCounters.TotalDiskWriteOperations
member.summary: Disk write operations per second. Note: macOS iostat provides combined transfers; this returns half as approximation.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemCounters.TotalDiskReadQueue
member.summary: Disk read queue length. Not readily available on macOS; returns null.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemCounters.TotalDiskWriteQueue
member.summary: Disk write queue length. Not readily available on macOS; returns null.

member.name: T:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemInfo
member.summary: Utility class for macOS system information retrieval.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemInfo.ExecuteCommand(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes a command and returns stdout.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemInfo.GetCpuUtilization
member.summary: Gets CPU utilization using top command. Returns percentage of CPU in use (100 - idle).

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemInfo.GetAvailableMemoryBytes
member.summary: Gets available memory using vm_stat. Returns available memory in bytes.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemInfo.GetDiskStats
member.summary: Gets disk I/O statistics using iostat. Returns combined transfer operations per second.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.Mac.MacSystemInfo.GetProcessCpuTime(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets process CPU time using the Process class.

member.name: T:PerformanceStatistics.PerformanceStatisticsFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating platform-appropriate performance statistics instances.

member.name: M:PerformanceStatistics.PerformanceStatisticsFactory.Create(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a performance statistics instance for the current platform.
member.param: Optional list of process names to monitor.
member.exception: Thrown when the current platform is not supported.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.PerformanceStatisticsFactory.IsPlatformSupported
member.summary: Checks if the current platform is supported.

member.summary: Statistics for monitored processes. Refreshes process data on each access; previous process handles are disposed.

member.summary: Retrieve active TCP connections by port (source, destination, or both).

member.summary: Adapter to make WindowsPerformanceStatistics implement IPerformanceStatistics. This allows the existing Windows implementation to be used through the common interface without modifying the original class.

member.param: Optional list of process names to monitor.

member.name: P:PerformanceStatistics.WindowsPerformanceStatisticsAdapter.MonitoredProcessNames
member.summary: List of process names to monitor.

member.summary: Retrieve active TCP connections filtered by source and/or destination port.

member.summary: Adapter for WindowsProcessCounters to implement IProcessCounters.

member.name: T:PerformanceStatistics.WindowsSystemCountersAdapter
member.summary: Adapter for WindowsSystemCounters to implement ISystemCounters.

member.summary: Total disk read operations per second.
